excerpt.rendered:
A good Macallan Cask strength that’s long discontinued. Bottled at 57.8% of sherry goodness, this is the Macallan adored around the world. We have a sherry bomb here and it’s a 750ml bottle for extra juice.

Bottle size : 750
Distillery : Macallan
Age :
Vintage : 
ABV : 57.80%
